title: google pixel contact sync
content: New user to Android here. Bought Pixel 3XL phone. I have 2 email accounts added in my Gmail app: work and personal. I don't want want to sync Work contacts to sync. I tried to Turn Off Contact sync, but as soon as I add Work account it sync the contacts before I get to the option to Turn it off.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
